definition[0]: strongly supporting a particular political party, plan, or leader, usually without considering the other choices carefully
definition[1]: relating to the fighting of an armed group against an enemy that has taken control of its country
definition[2]: someone who strongly supports a political party, plan, or leader
example[2]: a media campaign to represent Democrats as angry partisans
definition[3]: a member of an armed group that fights against an enemy that has taken control of its country
